treatments_requested.name: Benlysta
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Antibody inhibitor of the B-lymphocyte stimulator

guidelines_details: Benlysta is FDA approved for systemic lupus erythematosus.
soc_details: Benlysta has been demonstrated to be safe and effective in at least two randomized clinical trials.

study_details.key_findings: Benlysta is safe and effective compared with placebo in the treatment of systemic lupus erythematosus.

rationale: Benlysta is likely to be more beneficial for treatment of this patient’s medical condition than any available standard therapy.
